coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH4Introduction-Hint: With Bibliosoph, you  can send messages, roll special tables, and generate encounters, all through the simple push of a macro button. Forget the hassle of complex operations, Bibliosoph delivers all results and communication in engaging, thematic cards. This module not only simplifies in-game processes, but also enhances your overall storytelling, bringing your world to life in a visually appealing way. Make your gaming experience more immersive and streamlined with the robust functionalities of the Bibliosoph module.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.showDiceRolls-Hint: Show virtual dice rolls when cards are generated.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPartyMessageEnabled-Labe: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPrivateMessageEnabled-La: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardLayoutPrivateMessage-Hint: Shows only recipient portraits in the chat card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.privateMessageCompressedWindow-Hint: Shows only recipient portraits in the chat window.

coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsOdds-Hint: Chance (0–100) to find coins when investigating. Roll 1d100 ≤ this value to find coins.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxPlatinum-Hint: Maximum platinum pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxGold-Hint: Maximum gold pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxSilver-Hint: Maximum silver pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxElectrum-Hint: Maximum electrum pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsMaxCopper-Hint: Maximum copper pieces that can be found (0–max rolled).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationInventorySummaryNoActor: No character or token selected; items were not added to inventory.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationCoinsSummaryNoActor: No character or token selected; coins were not added.

coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2Injuries-Hint: Injuries alter the course of actions as each impact can unexpectedly ignite a new wound, trauma, or recovery chance, making your gaming journey uniquely fraught with peril and unpredictability.
